review: After giving this over a month of regular use.  We don't like it.  It really doesn't do Hulu plus.  Hulu plays well on other devices but freezes frequently on the fire stick.

review: This has been a fantastic improvement for streaming. Before this we had trouble (we had to use our DVD player to access it and it never seemed to work) watching online content and now it couldn't be easier! Definitely recommend :)
author: Amazon Customer

review: My son and daughter-in-law bought me the Fire TV Stick for my birthday. He installed it easily and we had it set up in no time. I love it! Simple to use and lots of choices from TV shows, good movie selections and children's shows for my grandson. There is much more that I still need to explore! Its a good bargain that offers a variety of entertainment in the convenience of your own home!
author: Amy Athey
